articles.title: Argentina drought takes toll on crop estimates
articles.description: Trade expectations for corn and soybean crops in Argentina continue to fall as the company experiences one of its worst droughts in 60 years.
articles.content: Trade expectations for corn and soybean crops in Argentina continue to fall as the company experiences one of its worst droughts in 60 years. The first full week of March 2023 continued the trend of hot and dry weeks in Argentina’s main soybean-produ... [1752 chars]

articles.title: Argentina Goalie Emiliano Martinez Auctions World Cup Gloves for USD 45 Thousand for Cancer Hospital
articles.description: Emiliano Martinez's FIFA World Cup-winning gloves were auctioned for $45,000 in aid of a children's cancer hospital
articles.content:
The gloves worn by Argentina goalkeeper Emiliano “Dibu" Martinez in the nail-biting penalty shootout with France at Qatar’s World Cup final last year were auctioned Friday for $45,000 in aid of a children’s cancer hospital.
